Build a secure, scalable, highly-available web front end in Azure

Apply for 1RMB Trial Buy Now

Highly scalable websites with HTTP load balancing and delivery control

  • Scalable, highly available HTTP load balancing
  • Cookie affinity for cross-session state sharing
  • 99.9% continuous uptime SLA for multi-instance gateways
  • Support for public and private websites
  • SSL offload for better resource utilization
  • Web Application Firewall

Scalable, highly available web application delivery

Azure Application Gateway offers application-level routing and load balancing services that let you build a scalable and highly available web front-end using Azure. You can control the size of the gateway and scale your deployment based on your needs.

Web Application Firewall

Protect your application from common web vulnerabilities and exploits such as SQL injection or cross-site scripting. Customize rules to reduce false positives.

Efficient, secure web front-end

SSL offload lets you build a secure web front-end using more efficient back-end servers, at the same time as streamlining your certificate management.

Close integration with Azure services

Easy integration with Azure Traffic Manager to support multi-region redirection, automatic failover, and zero-downtime maintenance. Application Gateway is also integrated with Azure Load Balancer to support scale-out and high availability for Internet-facing and internal-only web front-ends.
